name: Escape From The Mint
description:
Control quarters, nickels, and dimes, as they work together to escape from the mint!

Controls

This is a puzzle platformer where you control multiple characters, who are coins of various denominations. Specific controls and mechanics will be explained in the game. There are 12 total levels (including 3 tutorials) of various difficulties.

  • Left/right to move.
  • Up to jump.
  • J and L to cycle through the coins.
  • Down to enter payslots.
  • R to restart the level.
Credits

Made with Unity.

Programming

Lennart Jansson, Jon Schneider, and Anderson Wang

Art and Sound Effects

Lennart Jansson

Music

Anderson Wang

Level Design

Lennart Jansson, Colin Lu, Jon Schneider, and Anderson Wang
